name: One Endless Night at MLG's Remake
name_original: One Endless Night at MLG's Remake
description:
You are a fucking person, trapped in a haunted as fuck strip club with a triangle, statue, and some gay frog, and you're gonna get fucking killed fucking immediately. 8/8 best story evar -IGN

Coded entirely by ToonsterGames

Voice Acting by Devin Manning

Originally released on June 14th, 2016.
